content: Just over the wire...Thankfully the ships crew managed to prevent the unimaginable: Summary executions of Americans, which no doubt would have been video tapped. WTF over? We have all these military assets in the region, yet we haven't done **** to stop these morons. President Obama, Secretary Gates and the Joint Chiefs did good by securing that ship captain, however; swift overwhelming action must now be taken against the Pirates on the ground, in the air and of course on the high seas. Destroy them, destroy their boats, destroy their sanctuaries on land, ruin family picnics....these S.O.B's only understand a bullet in the damn head.

content: These are not armored gun boats these guys are using. Train the crew and arm them with 20 mm machine guns. It would not take any additional crewmen. The shipping industry needs to step up and take responsibility for their on security. We should keep a Naval presents in the region, but trying to be the first line of defense should not even be on the table.
